Description:
OPEN CANCELLED CONTACT AGENT
Sale by Negotiation
Your Dream Home Awaits You. Ex-Display
This absolute gem is awaiting the homeowner who wants it all. Showcasing impeccable workmanship alongside modern family luxury living overlooking parklands, close to schools, transport, ring road and freeeway access.
This Porter Davis home boasts a superb floor plan comprising of 4 lavish bedrooms, 2 stunning bathrooms as well a generous ensemble of living rooms.
Upon entering, guests are greeted by an impressive entry with soaring high ceilings. A decadent master suite complete with walk-in robes, large en suite and retreat which enables you to immerse yourself in absolute seclusion and serenity.
The property also comprises a generous study, dining area, casual living room and Theatre Room. The gourmet kitchen includes top quality stainless steel appliances, Caesar stone bench tops and glass splashback.
For leisure, the astounding property offers an exciting variety of indoor and outdoor options. It comprises of a massive alfresco area with outdoor Spa.
To further ensure a lifestyle of effortless peace and comfort, convenience and pleasure, the property also provides secure garaging for 2 cars heating/cooling and established landscaping contributes to this fine property.

Description:
Approx 48 Squares On 736sqm Of Parkfront Land
In an enviable location overlooking Derrimuts largest open parkland proudly stands this monstrous double storey residence. Offering almost 50 squares of luxury living and perched on a huge allotment of approximately 736sqm this home provides every type of informal and formal living/entertaining space you can think of and sleeping quarters consisting of 5 bedrooms serviced by 3 bathrooms. Highlights include the enormous kitchen and the masterfully designed master retreat where you can just shut the double doors and enjoy your own private 5 star apartment featuring double shower/spa ensuite, massive WIR and adjacent living area. Other features include floorboards, ducted heating, evaporative cooling, high ceilings, down lights, high doors, rendered facade, extensive outside decking, stainless steel appliances, ducted vacuum, feature walls, alarm, intercom, CCTV security system, double garage with remote, huge backyard and much more.
Insights: 27 Windsor Boulevard, DERRIMUT VIC 3030 was last sold in 2003.

Description:
OPEN FOR INSPECTION CANCELLED
Stylish, Modern Family Living
A fantastic opportunity to secure a stunning home situated in a great sought after location. Within short walking distance to all amenities including: recreational facilities, parklands, public transport, shops, local schools and much more. This beautifully proportioned home offers a stunning wide entrance and an abundance of features with lots of space for all the family to relax. Bedroom accommodation is generous.
Luxurious main with spa en-suite and double vanities, the other three bedrooms consisting of BIRs, also adding a large family retreat area where you will enjoy the most beautiful view from the balcony. Downstairs offers powder room, large laundry and a huge study area/ or 5th bedroom. Spacious family living areas, open plan meals area adjoining spacious modern kitchen boasting stainless steel appliances and granite bench top. The further massive entertainment area is ideal to gather family or friends together on a special occasion . Other highlights including evaporative cooling, ducted heating, beautiful light fittings, stone bench tops in all bathrooms and much more. This is the best pocket of Derrimut surrounded with quality neighbours.

Description:
Prime Land in Derrimut!
Build Your Dream Home!
Brimbank Gardens Estate, close to Foleys Road.
Representing value, this flat perfectly rectangular allotment of approximately 462sqm is priced to be sold in this exclusive pocket of Derrimut. With a large 14m frontage, 33m depth and surrounded by beautiful brand new homes this is an opportunity you must take advantage of. With no easement on the block your builder is going to love it which means a great chance of building what you want. Be quick.
Brimbank Gardens is a planned community only 17km from the city with over 10 hectares of parklands.
This property has convenient access to the Western Ring Road via the Deer Park by pass, is minutes from Deer Park train station and many amenities.
Call or email us for more information.

Description:
SOLD BY NICK MAKROGLOU & MAL BARTROP
Stockdale & Leggo Real Estate proudly presents 11 Pendragon Crescent Derrimut, a standout residence for the area. Boasting in excess of 52 squares (plus additional 2 square approx. covered outdoor entertainment area) this massive home will accommodate the largest of families in style with quality fixtures and fittings throughout. The property comprises 5 large bedrooms (3 with WIRs, 2 with BIRs), 7 formal and informal living/entertainment zones, 2 sensational bathrooms (one on each level)and a huge kitchen that is one of the many highlights of the property with thick Caesar stone bench tops, 900mm appliances, glass splashback and enormous walk in pantry. List of extra features is almost endless including ducted heating, parquetry flooring, high ceilings, gorgeous hardwood staircase, massive double door entry, down lights, alarm, bulkheads, decorative cornice, quality window furnishings, rendered facade, intercom, feature walls, landscaped gardens, balcony off the upstairs retreat, feature fireplace, spa in main bathroom, 2 outdoor entertainment areas with bi fold doors and double garage with remote. All this on a large block in arguably Derrimut's finest location surrounded by other grand homes and walking distance to all amenities. Inspection highly recommended to truly appreciate what is on offer.
Insights: 11 Pendragon Crescent, DERRIMUT VIC 3030 was last sold in 2014.

Stylish Home in the Heart of Derrimut
This cosy home with Locations as desirable as this one offers a lifestyle of convenience and simplicity with all essential day to day needs within very close walking proximity. Accommodating 3 good sized bedrooms with built in wardrobes (master with walk in robe and ensuite), fully equipped kitchen with upgraded stainless steel appliances and lots of cupboards to fill. Description:
A Lifestyle Choice
Upon entering this home you will be immediately impressed by the stunning presentation that highlights the features of what this home has to offer. Comprising of 4 bedrooms and seperate study, master with ensuite and WIRs, whilst the remaining bedrooms all have BIRs. With two living areas, the lounge/rumpus room is large enough for a billiard table with room to spare or it can used as a formal lounge. Your kitchen is ideally located next to the family room with surround sound speakers that will keep you entertained whilst preparing dinner. Leading out to the low maintenance landscaped rear yard and under the massive alfresco area you can enjoy those balmy nights with the ambience of the flowing water feature. This home is energy efficient and you will save on those rising energy bills with a water tank, led lights, solar hot water, 8kw solar electricity panels and insulated external walls. Other features include alarm system, roller shutters, Smartphone video surveillance and 24/7 video recording from the 4 cameras. The remote controlled double garage has bonus rear roller door access to the backyard. This property is located in a great neighbourhood with schools, parks, day care centre and the Derrimut Village.
Insights: 43 Chartwell Crescent, DERRIMUT VIC 3030 was last sold in 2014.

Description:
SOLD BY NICK MAKROGLOU
Investors and owner occupiers should move quickly to secure this great 4 bedroom residence in the booming suburb of Derrimut. With ample bedroom accommodation, 2 bathrooms, 2 living areas, alfresco and double garage with rear roller door access, this home offers a great start or can accommodate a large family. Currently tenanted at $1560 per month, the property is perfect for an investor, as the long term tenants would like to stay on. Alternatively with the current lease expiring on the 7th March 2014, owner occupiers also have the luxury of purchasing the property with vacant possession. Other features include ducted heating, cooling and the added bonus of being able to walk to all amenities. This great home promises to be popular. Please note inspections only during the allocated open times.

Description:
SOLD BY NICK MAKROGLOU!
Those that appreciate attention to detail will truly be impressed by the thought and effort that has gone into the design and creation of this wonderful Derrimut residence. Presented with pride and with everything already done for you, the lucky purchaser can just move in and start enjoying their own little private oasis. The home comprises 3 spacious bedrooms with BIRs, WIR and ensuite to master, and a lovely open plan kitchen/dining/ living area that has 2 sets of sliding doors leading out to the fantastic decked alfresco and rear gardens. Other features include ducted heating, 2 x reverse cycle air conditioners, 900mm stainless steel appliances, down lights, quality window furnishings, extended laundry bench and broom closet and double remote garage with storage shelving, internal and bonus rear roller door access.
Insights: 20 Dartmouth Chase, DERRIMUT VIC 3030 was last sold in 2014.

Description:
Something Really Special
If you enjoy entertaining then you will love this home. The stylish design offers 4 large bedrooms plus study, open plan living areas, modern kitchen/tiled, dining, covered outdoor entertainment Bbq area, minutes away from shops, schools, transport and easy access to freeways. Extras includes: ducted heating, ducted cooling, alarm system, remote controlled drapes, built in bar, extra-large double remote garage all set on a 790m2 approx. allotment. Inspect today to be impressed.

Description:
SOLD BY NICK MAKROGLOU & STEVE JUSUP
This is an opportunity for the astute purchaser to acquire approximately 541sqms of prime residential land in the most sought after pocket of Derrimut. Situated in one of the latest releases and surrounded by other modern homes this corner allotment lends itself to most house designs. Perfectly flat with a wide frontage park your home here and enjoy the easy access in and out of the estate and close proximity to all the suburbs amenities.
